extendedInfo.description: This App easily backup and restore your mobile data (Calendar, Contacts, SMS and Call Log) in SD card. The backup data is stored in the root directory of SD card.It give you a quick and simple backup restore experience when you need to reset the phone or erase all data on phone.Now, you can import your personal data from any phone to another phone via SD card. Easy-to-use backup solution for anytime and anywhere!â Features â¶ Support Android 1.5 ~ 4.2.x Platform.â¶ Restore data backed up in SD card.â¶ The backup data is stored in SD card below.  Calendar: /sdcard/Backup-Calendar.txt  Contacts (for Android 1.5~1.6):                   /sdcard/Backup-Contacts.txt  Contacts (for Android 2.0~4.2):                                /sdcard/Backup-Contacts2.1.txt         SMS: /sdcard/Backup-SMS.txt   Call Logs: /sdcard/Backup-CallLog.txtâ NOTE: Please do not hesitate to contact us if you experience any unexpected issues, or have additional questions or concerns regarding this App. Please send email to developer with issues for improvement.Thank you.

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: It\'s very easy and quick application, it contains all what can I need to backup. Just one thing I mention, which is while restoration I cannot read the backup files from anywhere on the mobile but have to put it in specific folder pre-reserved by the app (either on external or internal memory).
reviews.author: Amr Salah

reviews.title: Works very well :-)
reviews.comment: Convenient as it backs up several different things only using one app.
reviews.author: gabrielle harwood

reviews.title: Upset
reviews.comment: Used to work great..new phone put sd card in..says it cant find ..changed backup location...still cant find.uuggghh
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Did what I needed it to do
reviews.author: Regina Marie

reviews.title: Ni
reviews.comment: Vjg
reviews.author: Vicky Patel

reviews.comment: Took a while for contacts to become permanent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is ridiculous
reviews.comment: Have to do too much to recover my info n save. When recovering several copies of each message entry and saved in reverse. Have messages dated 2012 listed first.
reviews.author: Tee Johns

reviews.title: It works ok, backs up your stuff
reviews.comment: My biggest issue is that the app will increase the media volume on my device to 75% when notifying me that a backup is complete.  This is an issue when I\'m listening to music on my device, then a backup completes and the volume is increased automatically.
reviews.author: Peter Bellino

reviews.title: Lost all my contacts
reviews.comment: Before restoring I backedup to my sdcard and now while restoring it says it cannot find the backup file. ....... one fuckall app
reviews.author: Sandeep Rao

reviews.title: Usefull
reviews.comment: Simply but very usefull app. I recommend.

reviews.comment: Really very good application I like it...

reviews.title: Did backup SMS
reviews.comment: But not for last 2 weeks... I don\'t get it...

reviews.title: Working good
reviews.comment: But not good for contacts(do not save contact icons)

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It did exactly what it said it would, and the best part is that it\'s free! ;)  Thanks to the developers!

reviews.title: Easy
reviews.comment: Nice

reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Slobodan Vasic

reviews.title: Good for SMS, Call log & calendar backup
reviews.comment: This App is good. I dint mention contact backup coz for this I use gmail.
reviews.author: Shariq Roomi

reviews.title: Behave likes as spyware
reviews.comment: I think it upload the of phone contract information to it\'s server like as spyware. I have disabled  my WIFI  many times when it was backup contract. but my WIFI was enabled automatically every time, when it complete its backup then my WIFI disabled automatically. But i have selected the backup location to sd card..  i think it behave likes as spyware.
reviews.author: S.M. Sarwar Hasan

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: after spending several houyrs trying to find an easy way to transfer my contacts from my old android v1.6 phone to my new one i finally came across this. within 5 minutes i had installed and transfered my contcts, so easy. thank you so much :D
reviews.author: Paul Brown

reviews.comment: Moreover, why does it need the system related permissions, such as changing system setting, for such a backup and recovery apps!
reviews.author: Ka-Hoi, Tobby Ng
